S

ServiceConnection - Class in br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.subscriber
This class provides means to communicate with a SiNoS Service in order to listen situation nofitications.
ServiceConnection(String, int) - Constructor for class br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.subscriber.ServiceConnection
Connects to the SiNoS Service that is available in the specified host and port.
ServiceConnection(String, int, Level) - Constructor for class br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.subscriber.ServiceConnection
Connects to the SiNoS Service that is available in the specified host and port.
SituationChannel - Class in br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.publisher
This class creates a channel for publishing situations of a specific type in a specific SiNoS Service.
SituationChannel(String, int, Class<? extends SituationType>) - Constructor for class br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.publisher.SituationChannel
Creates a new Situation Channel in the specified host and port.
SituationChannel(String, int, Class<? extends SituationType>, Level) - Constructor for class br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.publisher.SituationChannel
Creates a new Situation Channel in the specified host and port.
SituationListener<T extends br.ufes.inf.lprm.situation.SituationType> - Class in br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.subscriber
This class provides methods for handling situation notifications from the subscribed channel.
SituationListener() - Constructor for class br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.subscriber.SituationListener
Initializes the Situation Listener.
SituationListener(StatefulKnowledgeSession) - Constructor for class br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.subscriber.SituationListener
Initializes the Situation Listener and enables the mirroring functionality.
subscribe(SituationListener<T>) - Method in class br.ufes.inf.lprm.sinos.subscriber.ServiceConnection
This method subscribes a listener in the connected SiNoS Service.
